text: Hot in the Shade is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on October 17, 1989. == Track listing == * Rise To It * Betrayed * Hide Your Heart * Prisoner Of Love * Read My Body * Love's A Slap In The Face * Forever * Silver Spoon * Cadillac Dreams * King Of Hearts * The Street Giveth And The Street Taketh Away * You Love Me To Hate You * Somewhere Between Heaven And Hell * Little Caesar * Boomerang Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1989 albums
title: Hot in the Shade
